nodes.text: Xenxiar was a terrestrial astronomical object in the galaxy, and one of the many locations where the Jedi Order established its presence early in its history. It was mentioned in a chapter of the Rammahgon, an ancient Jedi text written by the Jedi Kli the Elder.
Xenxiar was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: A Junior Novel, a 2020 adaptation of the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, written by Michael Kogge.
